Essence Disintegration.Elite 1: When the Originium Crystals attached to the enemy are consumed, the Endministrator gains ATK +15% for 15s. This effect cannot stack.
Essence Disintegration.Elite 2: When the Originium Crystals attached to the enemy are consumed, the Endministrator gains ATK +30% for 15s. This effect cannot stack.

Realspace Stasis.Elite 2: Enemies with attached Originium Crystals suffer Physical DMG Taken +10%.
Realspace Stasis.Elite 3: Enemies with attached Originium Crystals suffer Physical DMG Taken +20%.
